I would say both, but it really depended on the army.=A0 There was often a =
thin line between high ranking ashigaru and very low ranking samurai, so ei=
ther would suffice.=A0 Usually, it would be a high ranking ashigaru (the eq=
uivalent of a sergeant or a lieutennant in the U.S. Army), who would then b=
e under the command of either a kumigashira or a monogashira (division comm=
ander, one way or another).
